revision.summary: mandatory global ClusterRevision attribute added; CCB 1811 1812 1821
All Hubs changes and added feature map
New data model format and notation. Added User features. General cleanup of functionality

feature.name: PIN Credential
feature.summary: Lock supports PIN credentials (via keypad, or over-the-air)

feature.name: Finger Credentials
feature.summary: Lock supports finger related credentials (fingerprint, finger vein)

feature.name: Logging
feature.summary: Lock supports local/on-lock logging when Events are not supported

feature.name: Week Day Access Schedules
feature.summary: Lock supports week day user access schedules

feature.name: Door Position Sensor
feature.summary: Lock supports a door position sensor that indicates door's state

feature.name: Face Credentials
feature.summary: Lock supports face related credentials (face, iris, retina)

feature.name: Credential Over-the-Air Access
feature.summary: PIN codes over-the-air supported for lock/unlock operations

feature.name: User
feature.summary: Lock supports the user commands and database

feature.name: Year Day Access Schedules
feature.summary: Lock supports year day user access schedules

item.name: LockJammed
item.summary: Locking Mechanism Jammed

item.name: LockFactoryReset
item.summary: Lock Reset to Factory Defaults

item.name: LockRadioPowerCycled
item.summary: Lock Radio Power Cycled

item.name: WrongCodeEntryLimit
item.summary: Tamper Alarm - wrong code entry limit

item.name: FrontEsceutcheonRemoved
item.summary: Tamper Alarm - front escutcheon removed from main

item.name: DoorForcedOpen
item.summary: Forced Door Open under Door Locked Condition

item.name: DoorAjar
item.summary: Door ajar

item.name: ForcedUser
item.summary: Force User SOS alarm

item.name: Add
item.summary: Data is being added or was added

item.name: Clear
item.summary: Data is being cleared or was cleared

item.name: Modify
item.summary: Data is being modified or was modified

item.name: DoorOpen
item.summary: Door state is open

item.name: DoorClosed
item.summary: Door state is closed

item.name: DoorJammed
item.summary: Door state is jammed

item.name: DoorForcedOpen
item.summary: Door state is currently forced open

item.name: DoorUnspecifiedError
item.summary: Door state is invalid for unspecified reason

item.name: DoorAjar
item.summary: Door state is ajar

item.name: Unspecified
item.summary: Unspecified or manufacturer specific lock user data added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: ProgrammingCode
item.summary: Lock programming PIN code was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: UserIndex
item.summary: Lock user index was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: WeekDaySchedule
item.summary: Lock user week day schedule was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: YearDaySchedule
item.summary: Lock user year day schedule was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: HolidaySchedule
item.summary: Lock holiday schedule was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: PIN
item.summary: Lock user PIN code was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: RFID
item.summary: Lock user RFID code was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: Fingerprint
item.summary: Lock user fingerprint was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: FingerVein
item.summary: Lock user finger-vein information was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: Face
item.summary: Lock user face information was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: LockStateIsNotFullyLocked
item.summary: Lock state is not fully locked

item.name: LockStateIsFullyLocked
item.summary: Lock state is fully locked

item.name: LockStateIsFullyUnlocked
item.summary: Lock state is fully unlocked

item.name: PhysicalLockTypeIsDeadBolt
item.summary: Physical lock type is dead bolt

item.name: PhysicalLockTypeIsMagnetic
item.summary: Physical lock type is magnetic

item.name: PhysicalLockTypeIsOther
item.summary: Physical lock type is other

item.name: PhysicalLockTypeIsMortise
item.summary: Physical lock type is mortise

item.name: PhysicalLockTypeIsRim
item.summary: Physical lock type is rim

item.name: PhysicalLockTypeIsLatchBolt
item.summary: Physical lock type is latch bolt

item.name: PhysicalLockTypeIsCylindricalLock
item.summary: Physical lock type is cylindrical lock

item.name: PhysicalLockTypeIsTubularLock
item.summary: Physical lock type is tubular lock

item.name: PhysicalLockTypeIsInterconnectedLock
item.summary: Physical lock type is interconnected lock

item.name: PhysicalLockTypeIsDeadLatch
item.summary: Physical lock type is dead latch

item.name: PhysicalLockTypeIsDoorFurniture
item.summary: Physical lock type is door furniture

bitfield.name: Local Programming
bitfield.summary: 0 - Enable Local Programming Attribute default value is 0 (disabled) 1 - Enable Local Programming Attribute default value is 1 (enabled)

bitfield.name: Keypad Interface
bitfield.summary: 0 –Keypad Interface default access is disabled 1 - Keypad Interface default access is enabled

bitfield.name: Remote Interface
bitfield.summary: 0 - Remote Interface default access is disabled 1 - Remote Interface default access is enabled

bitfield.name: Sound Volume
bitfield.summary: 0 – Sound Volume attribute default value is 0 (Silent Mode) 1 – Sound Volume attribute default value is equal to something other than 0

bitfield.name: Auto Relock
bitfield.summary: 0 – Auto Relock Time attribute default value = 0 1 – Auto Relock Time attribute default value is equal to something other than 0

bitfield.name: LED Settings
bitfield.summary: 0 – LED Settings attribute default value = 0 1 – LED Settings attribute default value is equal to something other than 0

bitfield.name: Add Locally
bitfield.summary: 0 - The ability to add Users/credentials/Schedules locally is disabled 1 - The ability to add Users/Credentials/Schedules locally is enabled

bitfield.name: Modify Locally
bitfield.summary: 0 - The ability to modify Users/credentials/Schedules locally is disabled 1 - The ability to modify Users/Credentials/Schedules locally is enabled

bitfield.name: Clear Locally
bitfield.summary: 0 - The ability to clear Users/credentials/Schedules locally is disabled 1 - The ability to clear Users/Credentials/Schedules locally is enabled

bitfield.name: Adjust Locally
bitfield.summary: 0 - The ability to adjust lock settings locally is disabled 1 - The ability to adjust lock settings locally is enabled

bitfield.name: Alarm Code 0
bitfield.summary: Locking Mechanism Jammed

bitfield.name: Alarm Code 1
bitfield.summary: Lock Reset to Factory Defaults

bitfield.name: Alarm Code 3
bitfield.summary: RF Module Power Cycled

bitfield.name: Alarm Code 4
bitfield.summary: Tamper Alarm - wrong code entry limit

bitfield.name: Alarm Code 5
bitfield.summary: Tamper Alarm - front escutcheon removed from main

bitfield.name: Alarm Code 6
bitfield.summary: Forced Door Open under Door Locked Condition

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 0
bitfield.summary: Unknown or manufacturer-specific keypad operation event

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 1
bitfield.summary: Lock, source: keypad

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 2
bitfield.summary: Unlock, source: keypad

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 3
bitfield.summary: Lock, source: keypad, error: invalid PIN

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 4
bitfield.summary: Lock, source: keypad, error: invalid schedule

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 5
bitfield.summary: Unlock, source: keypad, error: invalid code

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 6
bitfield.summary: Unlock, source: keypad, error: invalid schedule

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 15
bitfield.summary: Non-Access User operation event, source keypad.

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 0
bitfield.summary: Unknown or manufacturer-specific remote operation event

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 1
bitfield.summary: Lock, source: remote

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 2
bitfield.summary: Unlock, source: remote

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 3
bitfield.summary: Lock, source: remote, error: invalid code

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 4
bitfield.summary: Lock, source: remote, error: invalid schedule

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 5
bitfield.summary: Unlock, source: remote, error: invalid code

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 6
bitfield.summary: Unlock, source: remote, error: invalid schedule

bitfield.name: Operation Even Code 0
bitfield.summary: Unknown or manufacturer-specific manual operation event

bitfield.name: Operation Even Code 1
bitfield.summary: Thumbturn Lock

bitfield.name: Operation Even Code 2
bitfield.summary: Thumbturn Unlock

bitfield.name: Operation Even Code 7
bitfield.summary: One touch lock

bitfield.name: Operation Even Code 8
bitfield.summary: Key Lock

bitfield.name: Operation Even Code 9
bitfield.summary: Key Unlock

bitfield.name: Operation Even Code 10
bitfield.summary: Auto lock

bitfield.name: Operation Even Code 11
bitfield.summary: Schedule Lock

bitfield.name: Operation Even Code 12
bitfield.summary: Schedule Unlock

bitfield.name: Operation Even Code 13
bitfield.summary: Manual Lock (Key or Thumbturn)

bitfield.name: Operation Even Code 14
bitfield.summary: Manual Unlock (Key or Thumbturn)

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 0
bitfield.summary: Unknown or manufacturer-specific keypad operation event

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 1
bitfield.summary: Lock, source: RFID

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 2
bitfield.summary: Unlock, source: RFID

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 3
bitfield.summary: Lock, source: RFID, error: invalid RFID ID

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 4
bitfield.summary: Lock, source: RFID, error: invalid schedule

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 5
bitfield.summary: Unlock, source: RFID, error: invalid RFID ID

bitfield.name: Operation Event Code 6
bitfield.summary: Unlock, source: RFID, error: invalid schedule

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 0
bitfield.summary: Unknown or manufacturer-specific keypad programming event

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 1
bitfield.summary: Programming PIN code changed, source: keypad User ID: programming user ID. PIN: default or programming PIN code if codes can be sent over the air per attribute. User type: default User Status: default

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 2
bitfield.summary: PIN added, source: keypad User ID: user ID that was added. PIN: code that was added (if codes can be sent over the air per attribute.) User type: default or type added. User Status: default or status added.

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 3
bitfield.summary: PIN cleared, source: keypad User ID: user ID that was cleared. PIN: code that was cleared (if codes can be sent over the air per attribute.) User type: default or type cleared. User Status: default or status cleared.

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 4
bitfield.summary: PIN changed Source: keypad User ID: user ID that was changed PIN: code that was changed (if codes can be sent over the air per attribute.) User type: default or type changed. User Status: default or status changed.

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 0
bitfield.summary: Unknown or manufacturer-specific remote programming event.

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 2
bitfield.summary: PIN added, source remote Same as keypad source above

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 3
bitfield.summary: PIN cleared, source remote Same as keypad source above.

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 4
bitfield.summary: PIN changed Source remote Same as keypad source above

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 5
bitfield.summary: RFID code added, Source remote

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 6
bitfield.summary: RFID code cleared, Source remote

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 0
bitfield.summary: Unknown or manufacturer-specific keypad programming event

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 5
bitfield.summary: ID Added, Source: RFID User ID: user ID that was added. ID: ID that was added (if codes can be sent over the air per attribute.) User Type: default or type added. User Status: default or status added.

bitfield.name: Program Event Code 6
bitfield.summary: ID cleared, Source: RFID User ID: user ID that was cleared. ID: ID that was cleared (if codes can be sent over the air per attribute.) User Type: default or type cleared. User Status: default or status cleared.
